_header: Bitterness of sorrow patiently He suffered man to win
_description: What Christ endured for Man — six long lines

BodLauMis706.First Lines:
Bitturnesse of sorow pacientliche he soffrid man to wynnKyndenesse
                    ffreleche he schewed aȝen mannes synne…
BodLauMis706.Last Lines:
…Kindernesse of loue that we fele by þe
                    compensacounGodnesse of profith that schull we fele by thonke and
                    satisfaccoun
